description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. March to the Moon is a shoot-em-up game where you learn abilities from 12 different skillsets.  Turn your enemies into skeletons and vampires as the necromancer, poison them and burn them as the alchemist, shoot and turn them into meat as the hunter.  Yes, even the robots turn into meat.  Don't stop there!  Learn a second skillset to get the dual-class paladin-necromancer you've always wanted.
description.short: March to the Moon is a shoot-em-up game where you learn abilities from 12 different skillsets.  Turn your enemies into skeletons and vampires as the necromancer, poison them and burn them as the alchemist, shoot and turn them into meat as the hunter.  Yes, even the robots turn into meat.  Don't stop there!  Learn a second skillset to get the dual-class paladin-necromancer you've always wanted.
